sections.heading: of property of debtor; proceedings; continuance
sections.text: The judge or referee, acting under the provisions of sections 25-1564 to 25-1580, shall have power to continue his proceedings from time to time until they are completed.SourceR.S.1867, Code ยง 544, p. 489;R.S.1913, ยง 8123;C.S.1922, ยง 9059;C.S.1929, ยง 2
